Title: Galentine's Day
Plot: When Leslie hears her mom?s story about an old flame, she and her boyfriend Justin track him down and reunite them on Valentine?s Day. Meanwhile, Andy and his band are nervous about playing a gig at the Senior Center.
GuestStars: Justin Theroux, Pamela Reed, John Larroquette, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Jama Williamson
